bstfun 0.1.2
  • Reference

Moves p-value footnotes to individual p-values

Source: R/gts_add_p_footnotes.R
gts_add_p_footnotes.Rd

This function converts a gtsummary object to the output type indicated in printer=: your object will no longer be of class gtsummary and you can no longer use gtsummary functions to modify the object.

gts_add_p_footnotes(x, printer = c("gt", "flextable"), index_start = 2)

Arguments

x

object with class "tbl_summary" created from the gtsummary package
printer

String indicating the output format. Must be one of "gt", or "flextable"
index_start

for flextable output, this is the number the footnotes begin counting from

Examples

library(gtsummary)

#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘gtsummary’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:bstfun’:
#> 
#>     trial
trial %>%
  select(trt, age, grade) %>%
  tbl_summary(by = trt) %>%
  add_p() %>%
  gts_add_p_footnotes()
